net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations

Class Union<L,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
      • net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations.Union<L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    L -
    K -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Automaton<L,K>

    public class Union<L,K>
extends AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
    Implementation of the union of a set of automata (its operands). The set of strings accepted by the union is the union of the set of strings accepted by its operands. The weight of a string is the minimum string weight of its operands (in case of the tropical semiring) or the sum of the string weights of its operands (in case of the probability semiring). The union has a topological order if all operands have one.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
